name: Formatting Test
features:
This character has various features which utilize different formatting styles, including:

  • The ability to cast arcane spells
  • Arcane Recovery: Once per day, you can recover spell slots during a short rest
  • Spell Mastery: At 18th level, select 1st and 2nd level spells to cast without using spell slots

Additionally, they have proficiency in Arcana and History skills.
inventory:
Spell Components Pouch - Contains rare materials needed for spellcasting

Spellbook - A leather-bound tome containing all known spells

  • Staff of Defense (requires attunement)
  • Potion of Greater Healing (2)
  • 50 feet of silk rope
  • Backpack containing:
    • Bedroll
    • Rations (5 days)
    • Waterskin

spells.cantrips:
Firebolt: Ranged spell attack, 1d10 fire damage

Mage Hand: Create a spectral hand to manipulate objects

Prestidigitation: Create minor magical effects

Dancing Lights: Create four torch-sized lights
spells.level1:
• Magic Missile: 3 darts, 1d4+1 force damage each, always hit
  • Shield: Reaction, +5 AC until next turn
  • Find Familiar: Summon a spirit to serve as a familiar
spells.level2:
Misty Step: Bonus action teleport up to 30 feet

Scorching Ray: 3 ranged spell attacks, 2d6 fire damage each
spells.level3:
Fireball: 20-foot radius sphere, 8d6 fire damage, Dex save for half

Counterspell: Reaction to counter a spell
spells.level4: Greater Invisibility: Target becomes invisible for concentration (up to 1 minute)

appearance:
This character has silver-white hair that flows down to their shoulders, with bright blue eyes that seem to glow faintly when casting spells. They stand 5'10" tall with a slender build typical of high elves.

They typically wear blue robes adorned with silver arcane symbols along the hems.
personalBackground:
Born into a noble family of elven arcanists, they spent centuries studying the magical arts before venturing out into the world.

They served as an apprentice to the renowned wizard Thalasian for over fifty years before striking out on their own.
personalityTraits:
Meticulous and precise in all things, particularly when it comes to magical research.

Has a tendency to speak in unnecessarily complex terms when explaining magical concepts.
ideals:
Knowledge: The pursuit of arcane knowledge is the highest calling.

Balance: Magic must be used responsibly and with care.
bonds: Sworn to protect the ancient knowledge contained in their family's spellbook, passed down for generations.
flaws:
Arrogant about their magical abilities and often dismissive of those who don't understand arcane concepts.

Has a fear of water after nearly drowning as a child.
